attributes.action: Please give a Knighthood to Mr Jeremy Clarkson
attributes.additional_details: This petition calls for the immediate Knighthood of Mr Jeremy Clarkson for his services to the British Sense of Humour which is slowing being irradicated in the mainstream media (BBC) by Political Correctness, dogmatic fear of offending anyone and general left wing hyperbole.  Thank you very much in advance of your consideration of this wonderful idea! :o)
